Title:
Mining Software Repositories for
Accurate Authorship
Published: Software Maintenance (ICSM), 2013 29th IEEE International Conference on
Elements_risk_assessment: We assume the lines that are deleted or changed in the fixing commit are the buggy lines
Summary: They used git-author to build a line-level model for bug prediction
Outcome: line-level model performs consistently better than the file-level model when evaluated on our data sets produced from the Apache HTTP server project
